ygData.subject: Re: Necromancers and Races
ygData.msgSnippet: Gnomes have the best stats for a necro.  You will be KOS in some good towns but I have found that it is easier to raise your faction than say a DE necro.
ygData.messageBody:
Gnomes have the best stats for a necro. You will be KOS in some good towns
but I have found that it is easier to raise your faction than say a DE
necro.

<-- Enigma -->
http://members.door.net/enigma



-----Original Message-----
From: Ko Enshaku [SMTP:grendel@...]
Sent: Monday, June 07, 1999 2:09 PM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Necromancers and Races

From: Ko Enshaku <grendel@...>

I have been recently considering the possibility of starting a
necromancer character and ran into a few problems. Originally, I ruled
out playing evil characters because the group of characters I will be
playing with the most frequently are all good races and entering towns
with them would be impossible. Can a necromancer of a good race enter
the town of other good races without fear of death? If not, it might not

be as bad as I had originally thought to play an evil necromancer,
specifically a dark elf.
What the pros and cons are of playing an erudite necromancer? or a
gnomish necromancer? or a dark elf necromancer?
I would appreciates anyone's input on this subject.
Thanks
